      • copyTemplate

        public static y.base.NodeCursor copyTemplate(MacromoleculeEditor editor,
                             y.view.Graph2D tgt,
                             y.base.Node newNode1,
                             y.base.Node overlapNode)
                                      throws org.helm.notation.MonomerException,
                                             org.jdom.JDOMException,
                                             java.io.IOException
        Copy the newly created node to the graph. if the new node is a Nucleic acid group node, it will add it to current graph and also connect the possible edges. For other single node, it just add the new node to the graph
